content.question: How many gallons of water enter the tank during the time interval <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>7</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BF2@</annotation> </semantics> </math>? Round your answer to the nearest gallon.
